deal_id: Legendary Greece - Small Group Discovery Tour
title: Legendary Greece - Small Group Discovery Tour
inclusions_evidence: 8 Breakfasts, 2 Lunches, 3 Dinners; hand-selected hotels and guided sightseeing; 'Price is for land, cruise and specified internal flights. International flights not included.'; Small Group Discovery limited to 18 guests.

hotel.name_or_hint: Crowne Plaza Athens City Centre; Olympia Europa; Grecotel Filoxenia Kalamata; Kyniska Palace (Mystras); NJV Athens Plaza (or equivalent first-class/first-class/deluxe hotels listed by Globus)

items.label: Guided tours, coach transport, local guides, some sightseeing and Local Favorites (e.g., honey farm, winery visit, Aegina ferry)
Meals included (8B,2L,3D) as part of the tour

other.notes: Exact DIY pricing for replicating included guided sightseeing, transfers, local-experience visits and meals requires specific travel dates, origin airport and supplier availability. Without concrete travel dates/origin and explicit currency on the Flight Centre page, reliable live quotes from booking.com/Expedia/airlines cannot be produced.

reasoning: Unable to produce reliable DIY numeric comparison because the deal page lacks travel dates and explicit currency/route; however the tour offers strong inclusions (8 breakfasts, guided sightseeing, small group max 18, multiple first-class hotels) while explicitly excluding international flights. That makes the package good value for land/cruise/tour inclusions but prevents an apples-to-apples DIY price comparison without dates/origin.
additional_notes: To produce a numeric DIY comparison and confirm if Flight Centre is cheaper, please provide: desired departure date(s), departure airport/city (country), and preferred currency. With those I will fetch live flight fares and hotel rates (booking.com/Expedia/direct suppliers) and return a full cost breakdown and savings calculation.
